Instantly transform any Youtube video, web page or search term into highly SEO-optimized blog content that reads like it was written by a real person - not AI!

If you've been disappointed with the quality of content from Chat GPT and other AI tools, this is the tool for you. 

Writebolt is AI content, perfected. 

Features:

- Humanised blog content generation based on the latest custom AI models
- Use any YOUTUBE VIDEO as a source to generate a blog post
- Use any WEB PAGE as a source to generate a blog post
- Use any SEARCH TERM as a source to generate a blog post
- Internal links inserted into every blog post at the touch of a button!
- Insert contextual research links into your article at the click of a button
- Alter tone or word count with ease
- NEW: Niche editing feature to make editing existing articles easy with AI

So much more to come. Feedback welcome!
